item.title: Style a markdown table with Bootstrap classes in Hugo
item.description: Inspired by this discussion, I wanted the ability to style a markdown table with Bootstrap table classes. In the past, I’ve accomplished this by defining the table in a data file, then building it with a shortcode. While this works fine, it’s better for a different use case.
